definitions.text: a domain that seems to be specially reserved for someone
examples: medicine is no longer a male preserve

definitions.text: a reservation where animals are protected
fruit preserved by cooking with sugar
keep or maintain in unaltered condition; cause to remain or last
examples: preserve the peace in the family

definitions.text: keep in safety and protect from harm, decay, loss, or destruction
examples: The old lady could not keep up the building
children must be taught to conserve our national heritage
The museum curator conserved the ancient manuscripts

definitions.text: to keep up and reserve for personal or special use
examples: She saved the old family photographs in a drawer

definitions.text: maintain in safety from injury, harm, or danger
keep undisturbed for personal or private use for hunting, shooting, or fishing
examples: preserve the forest and the lakes
